Name: PvZ2_Prepreprelease_WWP2
NewFeatures: 新增忧郁菇，具体能力请自行测试
新增淘金僵尸、斗篷僵尸、机械牛、拓展机械牛、西部小鬼僵尸、西部巨人僵尸
新增矿车功能，可以使用滚轮在轨道上直接操纵，也可以手拖动，手动植物在矿车外听取鼠标按下事件，在矿车上时听取鼠标松开事件
调整动态刷怪（随机行数的刷怪现在更加分散）
B、C难度下，埃及和海盗的个别关卡加入了铁轨与矿车
EnNewFeatures: Added Melancholy Mushrooms, please test the specific abilities yourself
Added Gold Rush Zombies, Cape Zombies, Mechanical Bulls, Expanded Mechanical Bulls, Western Imp Zombies, and Western Giant Zombies

Added Mine Cart function, which can be manipulated directly on the track using the scroll wheel or dragged by hand. Manual plants listen to mouse press events when outside the mine cart, and listen to mouse release events when on the mine cart
Adjusted dynamic monster spawning (random row monster spawning is now more dispersed)
In B and C difficulty, rails and mine carts have been added to individual levels of Egypt and Pirates
